# SampleConfs - Towns & Markets

Config files related to towns, cities, markets, and commercial systems.

## Town Core
- **TownName.json** - Town names
- **TownBuilding.json** - Town buildings
- **TownNpcInfo.json** - Town NPC information

## Markets & Commerce
- **TownMarketBase.json** - Base market system
- **TownMarketBook.json** - Book markets
- **TownMarketItem.json** - Item markets
- **TownBlackMarket.json** - Black market

## Town Buildings & Services
- **TownBookstore.json** - Bookstore
- **TownHotel.json** - Hotel/Inn
- **TownRefine.json** - Refining services
- **TownTransmit.json** - Transportation

## Auction System
- **TownAuction.json** - Auction house
- **TownAuctionDrama.json** - Auction events
- **TownAuctionProp.json** - Auction properties
- **TownAuctionSpecialItem.json** - Special auction items

## Factory & Production
- **TownFactotySell.json** - Factory sales
- **TownFactotySellArtifact.json** - Artifact factory sales

## Town Entertainment
- **TownPub.json** - Pub/Tavern
- **TownPubDrama.json** - Pub events
- **TownPubSub.json** - Pub subsystem
- **TownGirl.json** - Entertainment services

## Town Combat
- **TownFight.json** - Town fights/duels
- **TownFightDrama.json** - Fight events
- **TownFightSub.json** - Fight subsystem
- **TownBounty.json** - Bounty system

---

**Total:** 30+ files
